DOC.brief_summary: Randomised controlled trial of the use of phenobarbitone and carbamazepine in childhood epilepsy in Bangladesh with particular reference to behavioural side effects.
DOC.brief_title: Prediction of Childhood Epilepsy Outcome in Bangladesh
DOC.criteria: Active epilepsy Aged 215 years Excluded absence Myoclonic and malignant epilepsy syndromes Major motor and cognitive impairments Those currently receiving antiepilepsy drugs.
